item.description:
Tell No One is a French thriller, critically and commercially acclaimed for its genuine suspense quotient. The story, cast and performances all blend perfectly to make an excellent film. A personal favourite, I've seen this one before and can't wait to watch it again!

I wouldn't at all be surprised if this film were to get sold out, so buying your tickets online would probably be a prudent thing to do.

What: Ne le dis a personne (Tell no one)
When: Friday, March 20 at 7:30pm
Where: MFA
Cost: $10
Tickets: http://www.mfa.org/ca...
Reviews: http://www.imdb.com/t...
item.name: Ne le dis a personne
